headline: Revisiting 3M (MMM) Valuation After Its Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: 3M (MMM) has quietly climbed about 6% over the past month and more than 10% in the past 3 months, putting the stock back on many income and value investors radar. See our latest analysis for 3M. That move sits on top of a strong year to date, with a roughly 32% year to date share price return and a 34% total shareholder return over 12 months, suggesting momentum is rebuilding as investors reassess 3M’s risks and cash flow durability. If 3M’s rebound has you thinking more broadly about quality...
